changeSet.author: joao
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE HISTORICO ( ID_HISTORICO BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, ID_CARGO BIGINT, ID_ASSOCIADO BIGINT, ANO YEAR, PRIMARY KEY (ID_HISTORICO), FOREIGN KEY (ID_CARGO) REFERENCES CARGO(ID_CARGO) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (ID_ASSOCIADO) REFERENCES ASSOCIADO(ID_ASSOCIADO) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE );
